sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CRTBIMPT ( IMPT_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, IMPT_COST_GUBN CHAR(2) NOT NULL, IMPT_PART_NO VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, IMPT_EONO VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, IMPT_CUMT_NO NUMBER(10,0) NOT NULL, IMPT_COME_CODE CHAR(4) NOT NULL, IMPT_MATL_SEQ0 NUMBER(10,0) NOT NULL, IMPT_MATL_CODE VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, IMPT_STND_GUBN CHAR(1), IMPT_IMPT_CODE CHAR(3), IMPT_IMPT_APDT CHAR(8), IMPT_IMPT_COST NUMBER(14,6), IMPT_NATI_CODE CHAR(2), IMPT_EXCH_STND CHAR(1), IMPT_EXCH_GUBN CHAR(1), IMPT_EXCH_PROJ VARCHAR(3), IMPT_EXCH_MOGB CHAR(3), IMPT_EXCH_APDT CHAR(8), IMPT_EXCH_MONY NUMBER(16,6), IMPT_EXCH_USER NUMBER(16,6), IMPT_EXCH_APPL NUMBER(16,6), IMPT_LDCR_STND CHAR(1), IMPT_LDCR_CODE VARCHAR(8), IMPT_LDCR_APDT CHAR(8), IMPT_LDCR_RATE NUMBER(9,6), IMPT_LDCR_USER NUMBER(9,6), IMPT_LDCR_APPL NUMBER(9,6), IMPT_MATL_PRIC NUMBER(14,6), IMPT_TRIF_RATE NUMBER(6,2), IMPT_TRIF_INPT NUMBER(6,2), IMPT_TRIF_APPL NUMBER(6,2), IMPT_CARR_RATE NUMBER(9,6), IMPT_CARR_INPT NUMBER(9,6), IMPT_CARR_APPL NUMBER(9,6), IMPT_INSU_RATE NUMBER(9,6), IMPT_INSU_INPT NUMBER(9,6), IMPT_INSU_APPL NUMBER(9,6), IMPT_TRIF_PRIC NUMBER(14,6), IMPT_EXCH_LINK CHAR(1), IMPT_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), IMPT_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), IMPT_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), IMPT_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), CONSTRAINT CRTBIMPT_PK PRIMARY KEY (IMPT_CORP_CODE,IMPT_COST_GUBN,IMPT_PART_NO,IMPT_EONO,IMPT_CUMT_NO,IMPT_COME_CODE,IMPT_MATL_SEQ0,IMPT_MATL_CODE) )
